code: 'use client';import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{gsap}from'gsap';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LoadingScreen(){useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{if(typeof gsap!=='undefined'){clearInterval(interval);const svg=document.getElementById('svg');const tl=gsap.timeline();const curve='M0 502S175 272 500 272s500 230 500 230V0H0Z';const flat='M0 2S175 1 500 1s500 1 500 1V0H0Z';tl.to('.loader-wrap-heading .load-text , .loader-wrap-heading .cont',{delay:1.5,y:-100,opacity:0});tl.to(svg,{duration:0.5,attr:{d:curve},ease:'power2.easeIn'}).to(svg,{duration:0.5,attr:{d:flat},ease:'power2.easeOut'});tl.to('.loader-wrap',{y:-1500});tl.to('.loader-wrap',{zIndex:-1,display:'none'});tl.from('header',{y:200},'-=1.5');tl.from('header .container',{y:40,opacity:0,delay:0.3},'-=1.5');}},100);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loader-wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{viewBox:"0 0 1000 1000",preserveAspectRatio:"none",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("path",{id:"svg",d:"M0,1005S175,995,500,995s500,5,500,5V0H0Z"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader-wrap-heading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"load-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"L"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"o"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"a"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"d"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"i"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"g"})]})})]});}export default LoadingScreen;
